divs: Sighting Detailsi was just sitting doing my home work when i saw an od light thru the window above my neighborshouse i thought it was the street light goingcrazy , i went outside to look and it was a buetiful firey diamond with a unbelvible color of orange and red but more it was stunning silently no sound at all just hovering there.i got my sister and looked for the telescope but couldnt find it so we just stood there and watched and super fast it darted up and blinked before going into space.after the event i beleive in aliens and think i should of taken a picture of it.i will always cherish my memory and have a new veiw on things.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in St Augustine
There were no other sightings in St Augustine on or around April 25th 2007
